Token.Abstract: An Everlive framework object that is the local representation of the data stored in Everlive cloud.
Retrieves all the EVObject in background.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (BOOL success, NSError *error)

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all the EVObject in background.

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: The object to call selector on

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: The selector to call. It should have the following signature: (void)requestCompletedWithResult:(NSArray)result error:(NSError)error. error will be nill on success.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (BOOL success, NSError *error)

Token.Abstract: Saves a new EVObject in background.

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: The object to call selector on.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: The selector to call. It should have the following signature: (void)requestCompletedWithResult:(NSArray)result error:(NSError)error. error will be nill on success.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (BOOL success, NSError *error)

Parameter.Abstract: The selector to call. It should have the following signature: (void)requestCompletedWithResult:(NSArray)result error:(NSError)error. error will be nill on success.
